sentence: The goal of this research is to examine the ability of Gallium-68 (68Ga) Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen-11 (PSMA-11) positron emission tomography/computed tomography (PET/CT) to detect sites of recurrent prostate cancer in patients with biochemical recurrence previously treated with radical prostatectomy (RP) or external beam radiation (EBRT) and to assess treatment response to subsequent salvage therapy

sentence: This is a phase I/II, multi-center, open-label study of YH003 in combination with Toripalimab (anti-PD-1 mAb).
sents: {'This is a phase I/II, multi-center, open-label study of YH003 in combination with Toripalimab (anti-PD-1 mAb).', 'A Multicenter, Open-Label, Phase I/II Dose Escalation and Expansion Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Efficacy and Pharmacokinetics of YH003 in Combination With Toripalimab (Anti-PD-1 mAb) in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors.', 'The study is comprised of a dose escalation part (Part I) exploring escalating doses of YH003 in combination with fixed dose toripalimab in subjects with advanced solid tumors (Part I), followed by an expansion part (Part II) with three expansion cohorts'}

sentence: A Pivotal Trial Of Envafolimab, And Envafolimab In Combination With Ipilimumab, In Patients With Advanced Or Metastatic Undifferentiated Pleomorphic Sarcoma Or Myxofibrosarcoma Who Have Progressed On Prior Chemotherapy.
sents: {'A Pivotal Trial Of Envafolimab, And Envafolimab In Combination With Ipilimumab, In Patients With Advanced Or Metastatic Undifferentiated Pleomorphic Sarcoma Or Myxofibrosarcoma Who Have Progressed On Prior Chemotherapy.', 'This is a multicenter open-label, randomized, non-comparative, parallel cohort pivotal study of treatment with envafolimab (cohort A) or envafolimab combined with ipilimumab (cohort B) in patients with locally advanced, unresectable or metastatic undifferentiated pleomorphic sarcoma (UPS)/myxofibrosarcoma (MFS) who have progressed on one or two lines of chemotherapy'}
